casebody.data:
DOT
v.
ADAMS OUTDOOR ADVERTISING OF CHARLOTTE LIMITED PARTNERSHIP 206PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2016 Kenneth A. Sack, Assistant Attorney General, Dahr Joseph Tanoury, Associate City Attorney, for Department of Transportation. Craig D. Justus, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Adams Outdoor Advertising of Charlotte Limited Partnership.

John F. Maddrey, Solicitor General.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 24th of October 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 31st day of October 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
